entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries or rain showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Flurries changing to a few rain showers this afternoon. Snow level rising to 1200 metres this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to flurries late this evening and ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Snow level 1200 metres lowering to valley bottom late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
